name: Cogra
description:
you are cogra, a day weird sent from the spirit of the moon lake to send a message to the slime realm about the piles of fucking disgusting shit and the monsters.

use the arrow keys to move and use the space bar to jump hell yeah

after each boss you will get a password which you must remember because you need it to reload the game at that point later

this is the first cogra game but it will not be the last
